title: 著作
text:
學術論文

Cheng, Feng‑Chou; Hsieh, Chi‑Pan; Wang, Yin‑Lin; Chiang, Chun‑Pin. The considerations of a high school student for applying to dental school: A case of one‑to‑one counseling for higher education. Journal of Dental Sciences, 18(4), 1912, 2023.
Hsieh, Chi‑Pan. Nonequilibrium thermodynamics of ion flux through membrane channels. Entropy, 19(1), 40.
Hsieh, Chi‑Pan; Chiang, Cheng‑Chin; Huang, Chiung‑Wei. The mechanism of inward rectification in Kir channels: A novel kinetic model with non‑equilibrium thermodynamics approach. Biophysical Chemistry, 212, 1–8.
Hsieh, Chi‑Pan; Kuo, Chung‑Chin; Huang, Chiung‑Wei. Driving force–dependent block by internal Ba²⁺ on the Kir2.1 channel: Mechanistic insight into inward rectification. Biophysical Chemistry, 202, 40–57.
Tsai, Mei‑Hua; Fang, Kai‑Chi; Lu, Chia‑Hui; Chen, Chih‑Dao; Hsieh, Chi‑Pan; Chen, Tsung‑Tai. Positive attitudes and self‑harming behavior of adolescents in a juvenile detention house in Taiwan. European Child & Adolescent Psychiatry, 20(8), 413–418.
Hsieh, Chi‑Pan. Interpretation of the Ussing flux ratio from the fluctuation theorem. Biophysical Chemistry, 139(1), 57–62.
Hsieh, Chi‑Pan. Redox modulation of A-type K⁺ currents in pain-sensing dorsal root ganglion neurons. Biochemical and Biophysical Research Communications, 370(3), 445–449.
Kuo, Chung‑Chin; Lin, Bei‑Jung; Chang, Huai‑Ren; Hsieh, Chi‑Pan. Use‑dependent inhibition of the N‑methyl‑D-aspartate currents by felbamate: a gating modifier with selective binding to the desensitized channels. Molecular Pharmacology, 65(2), 370–380.
Kuo, Chung‑Chin; Lin, Ting‑Jiun; Hsieh, Chi‑Pan. Effect of Na⁺ flow on Cd²⁺ block of tetrodotoxin-resistant Na⁺ channels. The Journal of General Physiology, 120(2), 159–172.
謝其磐. 鉀離子通道的內向整流性質和不活化閥門氧化還原調控之研究. 臺灣大學生理學研究所博士學位論文。

title: 介紹
text:
嗨，大家好
我是一位家庭醫學科主治醫師，業餘喜歡自然科學與電腦的學習與分享。
歡迎交流討論。
Dr. 謝其磐
email: hsiehcp@protonmail.com
